infos.value: Who knew the tunnel would open up like this...
This seems to be where the actual mining takes place.
How...?
What happened? Where are the Sanctum Monks?
P-please...ru...run...
Qu...quick...
Commander...!
Aah!
Nngh...
Deputy Commander! Why would you...?
Don't you understand? This was a trap.
...A trap!?
They knew that «Crucium» had been dispatched here.
You mean to say...that there's a mole within our ranks?
Indeed, that seems to be the case.
Somewhere like this is an obvious choice if tasked with fighting our primarily close-combat division.
They'll turn us into pincushions with those arrows by the time we're able to reach them.
Th-this can't be...
If that's true...then the ones who will determine the outcome of this battle are you two.
Me...and Lu'Cia?
But don't push yourselves too far. If the tide turns in their favor, make your escape.
Make my escape... I cannot do such a thing!
We will fight to the end!
Then who exactly will inform Lord Jayden that one of the Sanctum's moles has infiltrated Rundall?
W-well...
If danger closes in, run away without hesitating. That is an order from me. Understood?
...Understood.
Creysse, let's move out.
